titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation commanding all the trained bands and others on this side Trent, to be in readinesse with horse and arms, to serve His Majestie for defence of the kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: York the last day of August in the sixteenth yeer of our reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: the cellour, 2) Lieutenan- be.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majesty: and
